name: LIRI-node-app
description: LIRI will search Spotify for songs, Bands in Town for concerts, and OMDB for movies. LIRI node app is a Command Line Interface(CLI) application.  ## Role in App development: This is an individual project with no contributors ## Techonologies Used: - Axios - moment - DotEnv - Node-Spotify-API - Node.js - JavaScript ## How the app works(Screen-Shots):
